triples.name: Game theory
triples.relevance: The paper analyzes deviations from game theory predictions in human behavior.

triples.name: Fairness
triples.relevance: The paper identifies that people care about fairness, a key deviation from self-interested behavior.

triples.name: Cooperation
triples.relevance: The paper discusses how people try to cooperate with others rather than act purely selfishly.

triples.name: Learning
triples.relevance: The paper emphasizes that behavioral deviations disappear with experience and discusses the learning process.

triples.name: Nash equilibrium
triples.relevance: The paper discusses convergence to game-theoretic equilibrium as people learn and gain experience.

triples.name: Behavioral game theory
triples.relevance: The paper advocates for developing behavioral game theory to explain deviations from rational game-theoretic predictions.
